items.sentence: Tom is doing everything Mary asked him to do.
Tom is approximately the same weight as Mary.
Tom is approximately the same height as Mary.
Tom hasn't eaten anything since this morning.
I told Tom everything that I knew about that.
Air pollution is a big issue in that country.
This restaurant has the best lasagna in town.
I'd definitely ask Tom to help if I were you.
I'm not the one who talked to Tom about that.
The room was filled with the smell of coffee.
